documents.document:
Founded job!!!

Yes!!! Hahaha, Foong founded job already!!!

Finally, Foong founded a job and Foong is so so so so so so so happy now!!!
Thanks for everyone who care Foong so much until today...(may be no one care Foong, but Foong still want to say Thanks...)
Hahaha, Finally, Foong got job again...
Wish Foong good luck, ok?
Smile, please be happy awlays...

Finally...Foong got a gf....

Just want to leave a message to tell all the world...
Foong already got a gf...
Who is the lucky girl?
Foong cannot tell u all before she agree me to tell u all...
Foong is so lucky to have a gf like her...
Foong sure will love her until the end of the world and still want to love her at the next life cycle of Foong and until forever...
Just like Foong promise to her...
Foong forever love her...No matter what...
Foong really love her so much until cannot losing her anymore...
Foong love her, u know?

Foong is so stupid on love...

Hello, anybody there???
May be nobody wish to read Foong blog, but Foong still wish to write somethings at here...
Foong is one stupid guy when Foong fall in love...
Why Foong saying like that?
All because Foong really is one stupid guy...
Stupid until Foong believe if Foong use all the heart to love the girl Foong love then Foong will get the girl love at the end...
Stupid until Foong believe if Foong love the girl forever then the girl will love Foong forever too...
Stupid until Foong always miss the girl Foong love everydays and after miss her still is miss her...
Stupid until Foong keep asking too much from the girl Foong love and get angry or mad if the girl Foong love don't answer Foong request...
Stupid until Foong willing to do anythings for the girl Foong love even Foong no power to do it...
Stupid until Foong wish to marry with the girl Foong love even Foong just beginning in love with her only...
Stupid until even Foong pocket only got $10 but still wish to give $9 for her and only keep $1 for Foong ownself only...
Still got so many stupid things Foong got did when Foong fall in love...
But, is that mean Foong really is one stupid guy?
Sometimes, in love, this is not call 'stupid', this is Foong believe what is call 'true love'...
But the problem is...
At this world, why no girl wish to believe Foong is true and pure on love??? Why no girl wish to accept Foong love???
Foong never did anythings wrong but why the god never give any chance for Foong to fall in love even for once time???
May be Foong cannot blame god, Foong only can blame Foong ownself...
As long as Foong is Foong, then Foong will still be the stupid guy when Foong fall in love...
Ok, today until here, hope u enjoy reading this blog and feel free to give Foong any comments, ok?
Good comments or bad comments also welcome, just leave Foong any comments, please...
Thanks, wish all the people Foong love will stay in healthy and happy always...

Foong heart is broken...

Just want to write a blog to remember today...
Foong heart is broken now...
Who make Foong heart broken?
Who got the such power and such magic can make Foong heart broken?
Foong don't want to say anythings anymore...
What is gone then is gone, just let it go...
Foong will still remain to be Foong...
Foong is still Foong...
Foong will never change the concept of love in Foong, never and never...
So, today Foong heart is broken once again...
Who wanna cheer Foong up?
Nobody...
Never mind, Foong is still Foong...
So, WindWalker is Foong...

Foong heart is ok again...

Just wish to write a blog today for let everybodys know...

Foong heart is ok again...

Why Foong heart broken two days ago but now ok again?

Hehe, this is what we call "Love"...

Foong heart ok again because the only one girl Foong love already give Foong an answer...

She told Foong like this...

"For the love relationship,we must give one another own space and time.

I just wanna say I love u, no matter what is happening.My love toward u will last forever and ever.Please believe me."

Haha, so after Foong knowing how she feel with Foong, after knowing she love Foong, after knowing her heart got Foong, so...

Foong heart is ok again...

And Foong heart is so sweet now...

Thanks for the girl Foong love...

Foong will love her no matter what...

Foong will love her forever until she married with Foong then Foong still will love her forever...

Even until next life cycle, Foong still want to lover her...

Yes, Foong really love her...

WindWalker love Angel forever...

Good News!!!

Hahaha...

Hahahahaha....

Why Foong so happy?

All because last night Foong gf lost one thing so important and then today morning she told me she manage to get her thing back...

Woh...Really is one good news!!!!

Foong last night feel so sad when Foong knowing the bad news...Worry until whole night cannot sleeping....

Then now after knowing she can get back her thing, then Foong is so happy for her now...Yes.....

WindWalker love Angel forever....

Angel sad then WindWalker sad too...

Angel happy then WindWalker happpy too...

This is what we call...."LOVE".

Right?

Angel, thanks for being WindWalker wife...We are in love, right?

PSP, PSP, PSP, Finally Foong is PSP owner!!!

Hahaha, hahahaha,

Why Foong so happy???

All because after dreaming for few years (may be two or three years), then finally Foong can become PSP owner now!!!

Yes, Sony PSP game console, finally Foong can own it and Foong life will become more colourful and no more boring anymore, hehe...

Actually Foong can buy it few years ago, why Foong never buy it and wish to wait until nowadays just buy it?

All because few years ago PSP cannot play modify games, so if buy it then need to buy original games to play which is so expensive one...

So, until nowadays, afetr Foong knowing PSP already can play modify games, so Foong just buy it without consider since this is Foong dream for many years already...

Finally, Foong dream come true...

Yes, this is mean we must live with a dream, if u live with a dream, so u will work hard to make the dream come true...

So, Foong next dream is what?

Hehe, tell u next time, today what important is...

Foong got PSP...Yes...

P/S: WindWalker love Angel forever...

Happy Birthday for Foong gf...

Just want to write some words to remember this sweet and unforgetable day...

Foong celebrate Foong gf birthday three days ago and Foong is so happy and so sweet on that day because Foong can celebrate her birthday with her...

Foong buy her one white sleeveless white dress and one pink bear soft toy, then going Swenses for having dinner, after having dinner Foong give her birthday gift which is make by Foong own hand..."Luck Star".

After she wearing that white dress then she become one angel, Foong angel...

After that we go for buy soft toy, after look for so many cute soft toys, finally she choose one super cute pink bear and then Foong buy it for her, she is so happy...

But, if money can buy the gift then is not the best gift for her, right? So, the most important and the best gift Foong ever make is...

One bottle full of 1280pcs Luck Stars...

Foong use true heart and full of love to making that Lucky Star, so after Foong gf received it and then she feel so happy and so sweet so touching...


Yes, this is the reason why Foong want to make the gift for her, Foong want to make her feel touching and sweet...

This is the best gift Foong ever make...

Once again, Foong at here wanna wish Foong gf happy forever and wish her birthday wish come true...

Angel, Foong love u forever...

Foong is heart broken now...

Foong is heart broken now...
Feel so sad and so sad...
Sad until dun know what to say already...
:........(

No matter what happen, life still need to continue...

No matter what happen....

No matter how sad we are....

Life still need to carry on and continue....

As long as WindWalker is WindWalker, Foong is Foong.....

Then Foong will always be happy and no matter what, Foong forever is Foong....
